p:
We simulated forest dynamics under projected climate and wildfire using the LANDIS-II forest succession and disturbance model, with the Century Succession extension
25 (v3.1.1) to simulate carbon pools and fluxes and the Dynamic Leaf Biomass Fuel extension
26 (v2.0) and Dynamic Fire extension
26 (v.2.0.5) to simulate wildfire and fuels. The model was previously parameterized and validated for our study area
16, 21 . While the model does not account for increasing atmospheric CO 2, empirical evidence indicates that CO 2 fertilization effects are less likely as a result of N limitation
27 .
